channel.title: Victor Guzman - Full Stack Developer
channel.description: Professional curriculum vitae and portfolio of Victor Guzman, a Full Stack Developer with 5+ years of experience in Node.js, React.js, AWS, and modern web technologies.

item.title: Full Stack Engineer at NTT - Current Position
item.description: Currently working as Full Stack Engineer at NTT (July 2024 - Present). Leading Node.js microservices architecture, React Next.js migrations, and AWS cloud implementations. Achieved 95% code coverage and led insurance sales module development.

item.title: 5+ Years of Full Stack Development Experience
item.description: Comprehensive professional experience spanning multiple companies including NTT, Asesoftware, Muebles Jamar, and Tejido Digital. Expertise in Node.js, React.js, NestJS, AWS, and modern web technologies. Led teams, architected solutions, and delivered successful projects.

item.title: Technical Expertise in Modern Web Technologies
item.description: Proficient in Frontend (React.js, Next.js, TypeScript), Backend (Node.js, NestJS, Express.js), Cloud & DevOps (AWS, Terraform, CI/CD), and Databases (DynamoDB, MySQL, PL/SQL). Strong focus on microservices architecture and testing strategies.

item.title: Systems Engineer - Universidad Simón Bolívar
item.description: Bachelor's degree in Systems Engineering from Universidad Simón Bolívar (2016-2021). Strong foundation in computer science, software engineering principles, and information technology.

item.title: Professional Contact Information
item.description: Connect with Victor Guzman: Phone +57 3002017402, Email victorguzber@gmail.com, LinkedIn linkedin.com/in/victorguzber, GitHub github.com/victorguz. Available for new opportunities and collaborations.
